TestXml.Title: Working with the File System
TestXml.Description: Working with files and directories in iOS using MonoTouch can be done with the same System.IO classes that you would use in any .NET application. Despite the familiar classes and methods, iOS implements some restrictions on the files that you can create or access and also provides special features for certain directories. This article outlines those restrictions and features, and introduces some sample code to show how the System.IO classes can be used in MonoTouch demonstrate how file access works in a MonoTouch application.
